IMDb data; ttnr: 0379725, Title: Capote, --- Description: Capote: Directed by Bennett Miller. With Allie Mickelson, Kelci Stephenson, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Craig Archibald. In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0379725/","name":"Capote","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzU0MjM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjczNzgyNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on dea","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0379725/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"aharmas","dateCreated":"2005-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cold Manipulation","reviewBody":"Every action has a reaction, and watching "Capote", we can't help but wonder how it ever got made. "Capote" is entrancing, dark, depressing, and quite satisfying. It benefits from Hoffman's perfect performance. He embodies the physical and psychological make up of a man who was the toast of the nation before and after the publication of its classic novel, "In Cold Blood". As a human being, he appeared to be an intelligent, fascinating, and manipulative creature. He could have gotten away with almost anything. Then he found the two criminals behind one of the most heinous crimes of the century and might have gotten to the realization he could also be trapped by their own dark existences.

It is difficult to ascertain what happened to Capote after he developed a relationship with Smith. He grows attracted to the actions and revelations behind this killer, and we never really know what is exactly going on. There are displays of guilt and detachment at different parts in the film. What we do see is that something really affected the man, and it changed his life for good.

The film moves slowly but never loses its audience. Along with Hoffman, a remarkable supporting cast keeps us interests going, and enough is presented to make us want to know more. That will probably be the film's only flaw. It fails to deliver everything it promises. It is a big satisfying tease, but after all, we are left with an endless number of questions. Keener is wonderful as Capote's supporting friend, and in his lover's role, Bruce Greenwood intrigues us as well, with the dubious character that never gives enough information to explain his attraction to a total opposite.

"Capote" is a really good film and should be admire for it achieves. For those who want to explore more in depth what lies behind the protagonists of the movie, there are several books that will give you a more detailed background on their nature. The truth, will however, remain, a big mystery.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128965,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-02-03","keywords":"gay lead character,kansas,prison,reading,death penalty","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Capote","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4173070617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNlNzkxNTktZWM4MC00Yzg1LTgzZTctN2UwZWYzNzg5YmY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNlNzkxNTktZWM4MC00Yzg1LTgzZTctN2UwZWYzNzg5YmY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000450/","name":"Philip Seymour Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004286/","name":"Clifton Collins Jr.","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001416/","name":"Catherine Keener"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0587955/","name":"Bennett Miller"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014453/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001246/","name":"Dan Futterman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1707307/","name":"Gerald Clarke"],"duration":"PT1H54M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Darkest Hour
Les heures sombres
programme.desc:
Darkest Hour: Directed by Joe Wright. With Gary Oldman, Kristin Scott Thomas, Ben Mendelsohn, Lily James. In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4555426/","name":"Darkest Hour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU4MjMwOTgyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQzNjY2NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4555426/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"themadmovieman"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Historically fascinating, but most importantly filled with exhilarating energy, humour and passion throughout","reviewBody":"Not only is this a riveting account of one of the most important moments of the Second World War, but it's also an exhilarating drama that goes beyond being a simple biography by bringing humour, energy and passion to every moment. With a stunning central performance by Gary Oldman, confident and passionate directing from Joe Wright, and a brilliant screenplay from start to finish, Darkest Hour is a simply exceptional film.

When telling a story as well-known as that of Winston Churchill and the Second World War, being both exciting and historically accurate isn't always easy, but that's where the unique take on the historical drama of Darkest Hour comes in.

Yes, it does tell of the extreme intensity of the early days of the war, the political manoeuvring in Westminster as Churchill was appointed Prime Minister, and the very real and impending threat that the fall of Britain could very well mean the end of freedom-loving Western civilisation, which are all absolutely fascinating to watch unfold, but they're all parts of history that you arguably already know very well.

That's why the film's decision to bring a brilliant sense of humour and a strong passion to proceedings is so effective. The importance of the events being portrayed on screen is never downplayed, and there are indeed some very intense and emotionally powerful moments, but there's so much more to Darkest Hour than just history, something that made it such a refreshing watch compared to how most Oscar-bait biographies turn out.

Above all, what impressed me most about the film was the fact that it's just so funny. It's by no means a comedy, but this isn't a pompous and dry historical drama, but one that takes glee in pointing out the eccentricities in its main character, eccentricities which are undoubtedly a part of why Churchill is so lauded and respected to this day.

While the film praises Churchill's bulldog spirit in fighting the fight against the Nazis, it's always keen to show him in a slightly brighter light, almost as if he was a man who stumbled into the most important job in history by coincidence. In that, there are so many genuinely hilarious scenes as Churchill's quirky personality clashes with the more uptight politicians of Westminster, a part of the film that I felt not only made everything more entertaining, but helped to give the movie an incredibly refreshing energy, allowing me to see Churchill in a very relatable, personal light rather than just as a historical figure from a textbook.

As well as being downright hilarious at points, there's a real passion behind the film's depiction of the darkest hours of the war. With Churchill being forced over to opening peace talks with Hitler, the film does an incredible job at inspiring you to a point of fever pitch, fully backing Churchill's bulldog spirit to fight and defend freedom to the very last moment, meaning that the internal conflict he suffers throughout the film is such a riveting focal point.

This is an undoubtedly patriotic film, and heaps a lot of praise onto Churchill's gusto, but that doesn't mean it's overly jingoistic. There may be a case that Brits watching the film will feel more emotion from its incredible passion, but I still feel that most of that comes from how well the character of Churchill is developed throughout, from a bumbling, mumbling, lovable old man to a truly honest and principled leader.

Finally, we have to talk about Gary Oldman's performance, which is amazing. For one, thanks of course in part to the make-up and costume teams, it's pretty impossible to tell that you're watching Gary Oldman in this movie. But not only does he look nothing like Oldman, and so much more like Churchill, but everything about Oldman's performance, from the smallest details about Churchill to his fantastic passion and energy on screen, pulls you further and further into the moment, and creates an exceptionally convincing portrayal of the great man and the situation surrounding him, which I was blown away by.

Overall, I absolutely loved Darkest Hour. It's an undoubtedly riveting historical drama about a crucial turning point in global history, but more than that, it's full of incredible energy from start to finish, with amazing and still appropriate humour throughout combined with stunning patriotic passion, making for a genuinely exciting and properly entertaining film that does so much more than your typical Oscar-bait fare.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":184944,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2017-12-22","keywords":"world war two,speech,prime minister,politics,winston churchill character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3915626777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0OTM5MDIxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ2Nzk2MzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0OTM5MDIxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ2Nzk2MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"This true story begins at the precipice of World War II as, within days of becoming Prime Minister of Great Britain, Winston Churchill (Academy Award nominee Gary Oldman) must face one of his most turbulent and defining trials: exploring a negotiated peace treaty with Nazi Germany, or standing firm to fight for the ideals, liberty and freedom of a nation. As the unstoppable Nazi forces roll across Western Europe and the threat of invasion is imminent, and with an unprepared public, a skeptical King, and his own party plotting against him, Churchill must withstand his darkest hour, rally a nation, and attempt to change the course of world history."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000198/","name":"Gary Oldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4141252/","name":"Lily James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000218/","name":"Kristin Scott Thomas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0346224/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565026/","name":"Anthony McCarten"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fourmi
Fourmi
programme.desc:
Fourmi: Directed by Julien Rappeneau. With François Damiens, Maleaume Paquin, André Dussollier, Ludivine Sagnier. Théo would like to give some hope to his father, Laurent, a lonely alcoholic and disillusioned with life. The opportunity comes when Théo is about to be signed by Arsenal FC." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9767556/","name":"Fourmi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjFiM2EtNmIxMy00NjIwLWFiNjctOTAxODBkMTNlZDllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Théo would like to give some hope to his father, Laurent, a lonely alcoholic and disillusioned with life. The opportunity comes when Théo is about to be signed by Arsenal FC.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9767556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A lie can save a human wreck.","reviewBody":"François Damiens is the stand out ,in his portrayal of a man,Laurent , who has lost everything ,even the custody of his only child, a teenage whiz kid ;considering the limitations he's working under,he's to be commended : the divorced man ,whose wife started a new life with a well-respected man who tries to win the boy's affection,a brat who has only eyes for his dad who of course sank into alcoholism ,it is a cliché to end all the clichés.

Laurent is really a poor pitiful man whose son's gift for football is his only reason to cling to life ;he's even become persona non grata on the football field,and,supreme vexation, he's denied to attend his boy's last game. Although he was not selected by the Arsenal FC recruiter ,Theo makes his father believe he is actually about to sign to the prestigious club.

Overnight ,helped by a devoted social worker , the overwrought man changes : he will find a job, he will learn English with a walkman and cassettes ( is it still used ?says the social worker), and ,last but not least ,he will quit drinking (a few relapses will happen). "Fourmi " (=ant;the football wizard is too short to be signed to Arsenal )is the story of a redemption.Theo knows that ,if he does not qualify for the selection,his father's life is irreparably doomed ;so he's compelled to lie to his coach (André Dussolier) and his assistant (who seems to prefer pastry cook to football,so do I).

Only his good friend,Karim is in secret ;as for the youngsters ' performances ,it's uneven :it goes from good (Laurent,Karim) to mediocre (Max ,the computer wizzard :how could you believe this giddy jerk would be able to write an email using the perfect club jargon,? the young actor acts as if he does not care)

The subject of the movie is a man's redemption ;it renders the denouement null and void ,a crowd-pleaser ,the expected event ; the movie would have been a hundred times more convincing without it , and reductio ad aburdum that a lie can be vital to save a human life .And that a man can help himself ,and ,after a while does not need his son's prowesses to be a human being again ( the bedroom he paints for him speaks volumes about his metamorphosis).And Mr Damiens was up to scratch!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-04","keywords":"alcoholic,competition,boy,fraud,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English IMDb data; ttnr: 9767556, Title: Fourmi, --- Description: Fourmi: Directed by Julien Rappeneau. With François Damiens, Maleaume Paquin, André Dussollier, Ludivine Sagnier. Théo would like to give some hope to his father, Laurent, a lonely alcoholic and disillusioned with life. The opportunity comes when Théo is about to be signed by Arsenal FC." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9767556/","name":"Fourmi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjFiM2EtNmIxMy00NjIwLWFiNjctOTAxODBkMTNlZDllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Théo would like to give some hope to his father, Laurent, a lonely alcoholic and disillusioned with life. The opportunity comes when Théo is about to be signed by Arsenal FC.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9767556/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen","dateCreated":"2020-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A lie can save a human wreck.","reviewBody":"François Damiens is the stand out ,in his portrayal of a man,Laurent , who has lost everything ,even the custody of his only child, a teenage whiz kid ;considering the limitations he's working under,he's to be commended : the divorced man ,whose wife started a new life with a well-respected man who tries to win the boy's affection,a brat who has only eyes for his dad who of course sank into alcoholism ,it is a cliché to end all the clichés.

Laurent is really a poor pitiful man whose son's gift for football is his only reason to cling to life ;he's even become persona non grata on the football field,and,supreme vexation, he's denied to attend his boy's last game. Although he was not selected by the Arsenal FC recruiter ,Theo makes his father believe he is actually about to sign to the prestigious club.

Overnight ,helped by a devoted social worker , the overwrought man changes : he will find a job, he will learn English with a walkman and cassettes ( is it still used ?says the social worker), and ,last but not least ,he will quit drinking (a few relapses will happen). "Fourmi " (=ant;the football wizard is too short to be signed to Arsenal )is the story of a redemption.Theo knows that ,if he does not qualify for the selection,his father's life is irreparably doomed ;so he's compelled to lie to his coach (André Dussolier) and his assistant (who seems to prefer pastry cook to football,so do I).

Only his good friend,Karim is in secret ;as for the youngsters ' performances ,it's uneven :it goes from good (Laurent,Karim) to mediocre (Max ,the computer wizzard :how could you believe this giddy jerk would be able to write an email using the perfect club jargon,? the young actor acts as if he does not care)

The subject of the movie is a man's redemption ;it renders the denouement null and void ,a crowd-pleaser ,the expected event ; the movie would have been a hundred times more convincing without it , and reductio ad aburdum that a lie can be vital to save a human life .And that a man can help himself ,and ,after a while does not need his son's prowesses to be a human being again ( the bedroom he paints for him speaks volumes about his metamorphosis).And Mr Damiens was up to scratch!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-04","keywords":"alcoholic,competition,boy,fraud,father son relationship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3418340889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRhMGJmYTMtMGI4OC00Y2E2LWJiZDgtZTU5ZWVlMTc0NGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRhMGJmYTMtMGI4OC00Y2E2LWJiZDgtZTU5ZWVlMTc0NGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1460782/","name":"François Damiens","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9521992/","name":"Maleaume Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0244707/","name":"André Dussollier"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1272853/","name":"Julien Rappeneau"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170513/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0663623/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10965776/","name":"Artur Laperla","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1272853/","name":"Julien Rappeneau","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6504693/","name":"Mario Torrecillas"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

From Montmartre to the remote French countryside, Maigret encounters the dark side of the human psyche. Yet, he manages to maintain both compassion and a sense of humor as he explores the complex motives that lie behind every crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0107221/","name":"Maigret","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1OTU0MzAzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwOTQ0OTc5._V1_.jpg","description":"From Montmartre to the remote French countryside, Maigret encounters the dark side of the human psyche. Yet, he manages to maintain both compassion and a sense of humor as he explores the complex motives that lie behind every crime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0107221/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lucy-66","dateCreated":"2000-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderful series","reviewBody":"Filmed I think in Budapest, it has the shabby, faded look of the 50s. Writing, directing and acting are all top-notch. Many respected thespians pass through: Peter Blythe, Edward Petherbridge, Betty Marsden, Toyah Wilcox, Anne Todd - yes, that Anne Todd. Like the Simenon novels, the episodes are thick with atmosphere and explore the seedy realities of life. The characters are not nice middle class people who appreciate classical music and whose children go to good schools. They are a spendthrift playboy in a mouldy chateaux, or a stripper with - not a heart of gold but a few moments of tenderness. They are dentist's assistants, schoolboys, mendacious antique dealers, toyboys, prostitutes. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0098844, Title: Law & Order, --- Description: Law & Order: Created by Dick Wolf. With S. Epatha Merkerson, Sam Waterston, Jerry Orbach, Steven Hill. Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0098844/","name":"Law & Order","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzViNWZjZTQtMzNkMi00ZTIxLWE1NmMtMmUwOTg4OWMyYmI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0098844/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"domino1003","dateCreated":"2004-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for Briscoe and McCoy!","reviewBody":"To be honest, I didn't become a real fan of the series until Jerry Orbach (Detective Briscoe)and Sam Waterston(EADA McCoy)came into the picture. This is when the series starts to pick up steam. Watching the show, you can't help but laugh at Briscoe's remarks or feel the passion of McCoy. Both of these men want justice, and will do everything within limits to bring the wrongdoers to justice. What I really like about the show is the wonderful twists and turns that they throw to the audience, as well as the "ripped from the headlines" episodes. Even though you have 2 more in the "Law And Order" franchise, the original is STILL the best!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33425,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1990-09-13","keywords":"shared universe,copaganda,profanity,ampersand in title,punctuation in title","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001583/","name":"Jerry Orbach","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0552509/","name":"Jesse L. programme.title: Tunna blå linjen
Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Tunna blå linjen: With Amanda Jansson, Oscar Töringe, Gizem Erdogan, Per Lasson. An intimate portrayal of the daily life of four police officers, where the line between private and professional life blurs out as tensions heighten in the animated and crime-ridden city of Malmö, Sweden." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt12258710/","name":"Tunna blå linjen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJkMGFmMDgtY2UxMC00OTI2LTljN2EtZjNjOTcwZjg2NDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"An intimate portrayal of the daily life of four police officers, where the line between private and professional life blurs out as tensions heighten in the animated and crime-ridden city of Malmö, Sweden.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12258710/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jtukko"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scandinavian "The Wire"","reviewBody":"As a former big city paramedic I can say this is spot on or at least very close to it. Of course this is still just a police series, but it's (unfortunately) very realistic. I give it 10 after 3 episodes because it's well made, realistic and it's something new in Scandinavian police series. «Jakta på ein morder» was little bit better but not same style. Its more «true crime» so I wouldn't compare these to.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-01-17","keywords":"police,malmo sweden,sweden,nordic noir","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8608851/","name":"Amanda Jansson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5158927/","name":"Oscar Töringe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6760258/","name":"Gizem Erdogan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414702/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079546/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059852/"}]}</script><metacontent="

Yet, he manages to maintain both compassion and a sense of humor as he explores the complex motives that lie behind every crime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0107221/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lucy-66","dateCreated":"2000-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderful series","reviewBody":"Filmed I think in Budapest, it has the shabby, faded look of the 50s. Writing, directing and acting are all top-notch. Many respected thespians pass through: Peter Blythe, Edward Petherbridge, Betty Marsden, Toyah Wilcox, Anne Todd - yes, that Anne Todd. Like the Simenon novels, the episodes are thick with atmosphere and explore the seedy realities of life. The characters are not nice middle class people who appreciate classical music and whose children go to good schools. They are a spendthrift playboy in a mouldy chateaux, or a stripper with - not a heart of gold but a few moments of tenderness. They are dentist's assistants, schoolboys, mendacious antique dealers, toyboys, prostitutes. IMDb data; ttnr: 0286486, Title: The Shield, --- Description: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lokutus-1","dateCreated":"2009-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"I thought i'd seen it all","reviewBody":"I never wrote a review on IMDb, but after reading that many bad reviews about The Shield i felt i had to do this. In fact all that reviews kept me from seeing The Shield for a long time.

But now that i am through with all Lost and 24 Seasons, seen The Wire twice, had a good time with Oz it was time for something new, so i finally gave The Shield a chance.

And i can tell you it's one hell of a ride, i was hooked after seeing the first episode. I would even compare the series to The Wire, it is different of course and doesn't focus so much on the social aspects, it goes more for the action.

It's got all you need, corrupt cops, drugs, violence, betrayal, good detective work (homicide team) and even some hot chicks occasionally ;) So my conclusion is that if you like quality series with a persistent plot and cliffhangers like The Wire, Lost, Sopranos or Oz go for this one you won't regret it! It will keep you on the edge of your seat for a long time.

And i really can't understand where all those bad reviews are coming from... go check The Shield out for yourself!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75913,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 5868826, Title: La peste, --- Description: La peste: Created by Rafael Cobos, Alberto Rodríguez. With Pablo Molinero, Patricia López Arnaiz, Sergio Castellanos, Cecilia Gómez. During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races, where 50 different languages were spoken, and all the gold from America arrived into its port. It was one of the smelliest, most beautiful cities in the world, and the setting for this unique, character-driven thriller." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5868826/","name":"La peste","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI0NThlN2MtYTcyYS00MGU1LTgxNzItNTljYzU4MDZjYjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg3NzY0NDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it w","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5868826/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2020-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A peculiar, unique and character-driven thriller with wonderful cinematography and nice acting","reviewBody":"Good but dark series formed by 2 seasons, 12 episodes , being very well set , nicely played and from visual point of view it is magnificent. Spain had become an empire by 1500's under Catholic Kings : Isabel and Fernando , Charles I and after Felipe II , the most poweful country in Europe and all over the world at the time . It is set in Sevilla, 16th century, one of the most marvellous and smelliest cities in the world , it is a time of plague , pursuit , superstition, as well as hyper-religiosity and during a terrible plague epidemic . There appears Mateo Nuñez : Pablo Molinero , he is a condemned by Inquisition, as a high-authority priest named Celso de Guevara : Manolo Solo assigns him to investigate a series of murders happened in the noisy city of Seville where more than forty different languages were spoken and all the gold from America arrived on its por t. In the midst of a dirty atmosphere suffocated by mistrust and betrayals on the order of the day , he will have to discover the author of such astonishing and grisly killings . The second season deals with Mateo Nuñez and Teresa Pinelo : Patricia López Arnaiz , who face off Maria de la O : Stefania de los Santos , and a dangerous and bloody criminal organization, Mafia-alike, called La Garduña operating in Sevilla by human trafficking , prostitution and labouring exploitation.

Nice costumer, dense and painfully realistic mystery thriller with solid performance , enjoyable locations , impeccable scenarios and lavishly filmed. Set in the post-Medieval Seville with its social constitution struck by the plague , it was one of the main cities of the Western world , known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races and people of all kinds and strangest conditions . Do not expect luxurious palaces , sweet Renaissance settings and gorgeous decoration seen in other foreign series such Versalles, The Borgia , Michael Hirst's Tudor or Richard Madden's The Medici. On the contrary, you can appreciate sinister environments , brothels , dirtiness, bowery, city slums and the deepest poverty. As far as I'm concerned the especial writing is pretty well , being its authentic creators Rafael Cobos and Alberto Rodriguez. Convincingly performed by Pablo Molinero as Matthew who investigates the found corpses of several murdered people as an omen of the end of the world . Matthew will have to find out who is the author of a series of diabolical crimes committed against the high places of Sevillian society . Otherwise , he will not find the forgiveness of the Holy Office and the Inquisition as he will decide to investigate it at whatever means. Being finely accompanied by Patricia López Arnaiz as a mysterious factory owner , Paco Tous as her administrator assistant , Paco León, Manolo Solo, Cecilia Gómez, Sergio Castellanos, Manuel Morón , Melina Matthews, Estefania de Santos, Jesús Carroza, Julián Villagrán, Antonio Dechent, Luis Callejo , among others.

It displays an evocative and atmospheric musical score by Julio de la Rosa. It contains picturesque cinematography by cameramen Rau Steve and Andreu Adamo Rubiralta. Shot on several locations as Utrera, Coria del Rio, Dos Hermanas Carmona, Santiponce, Alcala de Guadaira, Gelves, Mairena, Puebla de Rio, Sevilla, Trujillo, Caceres, Palos de la Frontera, Huelva, Cuevas de Almanzora, Almeria, and Toledo. And we can find the real interiors of the Sevillian Palaces, Casa Contratation of Sevilla and sightseeing as the riverside, Giralda, Torre del Oro, Cathedral and other buildings, monuments by means of CGI. This surprising crime drama was well directed by Alberto Rodriguez. He is considered to be one of the best Spanish filmmakers, including notorious films as Grupo 7, Factor Pilgrim, 7 Virgins, The suit , El hombre de las 1000 caras, being his biggest hit : Marshland . Rating : above average, 7/10 for the accuracy in depicting the XVI century city , as the money are not waste, though not for too squeamish watchers due to its sour seeing of poorness, sleazy events, nudism , heinous killings and extreme realism .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1857,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-12","keywords":"plague,murder investigation,death,violence,blood","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1944825/","name":"Pablo Molinero","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3802082/","name":"Patricia López Arnaiz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1525783/","name":"Sergio Castellanos"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296182/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0544623/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1943791/","name":"Rafael Cobos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735705/","name":"Alberto Rodríguez"]</script><metacontent="

During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races, where 50 different languages were spoken, and all the gold from America arrived into its port. It was one of the smelliest, most beautiful cities in the world, and the setting for this unique, character-driven thriller." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5868826/","name":"La peste","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI0NThlN2MtYTcyYS00MGU1LTgxNzItNTljYzU4MDZjYjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg3NzY0NDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it w","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5868826/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2020-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A peculiar, unique and character-driven thriller with wonderful cinematography and nice acting","reviewBody":"Good but dark series formed by 2 seasons, 12 episodes , being very well set , nicely played and from visual point of view it is magnificent. Spain had become an empire by 1500's under Catholic Kings : Isabel and Fernando , Charles I and after Felipe II , the most poweful country in Europe and all over the world at the time . It is set in Sevilla, 16th century, one of the most marvellous and smelliest cities in the world , it is a time of plague , pursuit , superstition, as well as hyper-religiosity and during a terrible plague epidemic . There appears Mateo Nuñez : Pablo Molinero , he is a condemned by Inquisition, as a high-authority priest named Celso de Guevara : Manolo Solo assigns him to investigate a series of murders happened in the noisy city of Seville where more than forty different languages were spoken and all the gold from America arrived on its por t. In the midst of a dirty atmosphere suffocated by mistrust and betrayals on the order of the day , he will have to discover the author of such astonishing and grisly killings . The second season deals with Mateo Nuñez and Teresa Pinelo : Patricia López Arnaiz , who face off Maria de la O : Stefania de los Santos , and a dangerous and bloody criminal organization, Mafia-alike, called La Garduña operating in Sevilla by human trafficking , prostitution and labouring exploitation.

Nice costumer, dense and painfully realistic mystery thriller with solid performance , enjoyable locations , impeccable scenarios and lavishly filmed. Set in the post-Medieval Seville with its social constitution struck by the plague , it was one of the main cities of the Western world , known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races and people of all kinds and strangest conditions . Do not expect luxurious palaces , sweet Renaissance settings and gorgeous decoration seen in other foreign series such Versalles, The Borgia , Michael Hirst's Tudor or Richard Madden's The Medici. On the contrary, you can appreciate sinister environments , brothels , dirtiness, bowery, city slums and the deepest poverty. As far as I'm concerned the especial writing is pretty well , being its authentic creators Rafael Cobos and Alberto Rodriguez. Convincingly performed by Pablo Molinero as Matthew who investigates the found corpses of several murdered people as an omen of the end of the world . Matthew will have to find out who is the author of a series of diabolical crimes committed against the high places of Sevillian society . Otherwise , he will not find the forgiveness of the Holy Office and the Inquisition as he will decide to investigate it at whatever means. Being finely accompanied by Patricia López Arnaiz as a mysterious factory owner , Paco Tous as her administrator assistant , Paco León, Manolo Solo, Cecilia Gómez, Sergio Castellanos, Manuel Morón , Melina Matthews, Estefania de Santos, Jesús Carroza, Julián Villagrán, Antonio Dechent, Luis Callejo , among others.

It displays an evocative and atmospheric musical score by Julio de la Rosa. It contains picturesque cinematography by cameramen Rau Steve and Andreu Adamo Rubiralta. Shot on several locations as Utrera, Coria del Rio, Dos Hermanas Carmona, Santiponce, Alcala de Guadaira, Gelves, Mairena, Puebla de Rio, Sevilla, Trujillo, Caceres, Palos de la Frontera, Huelva, Cuevas de Almanzora, Almeria, and Toledo. And we can find the real interiors of the Sevillian Palaces, Casa Contratation of Sevilla and sightseeing as the riverside, Giralda, Torre del Oro, Cathedral and other buildings, monuments by means of CGI. This surprising crime drama was well directed by Alberto Rodriguez. He is considered to be one of the best Spanish filmmakers, including notorious films as Grupo 7, Factor Pilgrim, 7 Virgins, The suit , El hombre de las 1000 caras, being his biggest hit : Marshland . Rating : above average, 7/10 for the accuracy in depicting the XVI century city , as the money are not waste, though not for too squeamish watchers due to its sour seeing of poorness, sleazy events, nudism , heinous killings and extreme realism .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1857,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-12","keywords":"plague,murder investigation,death,violence,blood","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1944825/","name":"Pablo Molinero","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3802082/","name":"Patricia López Arnaiz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1525783/","name":"Sergio Castellanos"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296182/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0544623/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1943791/","name":"Rafael Cobos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735705/","name":"Alberto Rodríguez"]</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Luck
Luck

credits.actor: Dustin Hoffman, Dennis Farina, John Ortiz, Richard Kind, Kevin Dunn

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 1578887, Title: Luck, --- Description: Luck: Created by David Milch. With Dustin Hoffman, Dennis Farina, John Ortiz, Richard Kind. A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1578887/","name":"Luck","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5MDUyMDY0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTAyMTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1578887/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"AMichaelL","dateCreated":"2012-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Most Ironic Series Title, Ever.","reviewBody":"Luck was an epic show. In only 9 episodes, it weaved together numerous, insanely complex story lines which many people probably had trouble following. But what started as a 'too dense for anything but pretense' project soon turned into an amazingly broad show whose characters included mafia, rounders, trainers, jockeys, agents, horse owners, and many others - to create an incredibly smart show which, in my opinion, sought to expose the world of horse racing to the many who are uninformed, or simply would not normally care. The characters and writing were top notch, and this definitely should have been allowed more time to flesh out.\n\nHopefully another network won't be as scared of PETA and will pick it up.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5656,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2012-01-29","keywords":"horse race,horse trainer,organized crime,gambling,racetrack","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000163/","name":"Dustin Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001199/","name":"Dennis Farina","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651159/","name":"John Ortiz"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035930/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586965/","name":"David Milch"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Luck","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3881213465","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A promo for the new HBO series centered around characters tied to the same horse-racing track. "</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0421030, Title: Big Love, --- Description: Big Love: Created by Mark V. Olsen, Will Scheffer. With Bill Paxton, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Chloë Sevigny, Ginnifer Goodwin. A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. Olsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770504/","name":"Will Scheffer"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Big Love","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2768149273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A critic's trailer for the HBO drama "Big Love," now airing its final season."</script><metacontent="

I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. IMDb data; ttnr: 0835434, Title: In Treatment, --- Description: In Treatment: Created by Rodrigo García, Hagai Levi, Nir Bergman, Ori Sivan. With Gabriel Byrne, Uzo Aduba, Dianne Wiest, Michelle Forbes. A psychotherapist questions his abilities and gets help by reuniting with his old therapist, whom he has not seen for ten years." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0835434/","name":"In Treatment","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxOTEzMWMtOWMyZi00NDBjLWFlZTktMTNkZDI0OWZiNWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyMjQ3NzQ1._V1_.jpg","description":"A psychotherapist questions his abilities and gets help by reuniting with his old therapist, whom he has not seen for ten years.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0835434/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"httpmom","dateCreated":"2008-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has teeth and knows how to use them!","reviewBody":"The Sopranos, Six Feet Under, and Rome ending, left a gaping hole in the heart of HBO for me. 

I was ready to drop my subscription when I realized that Gabriel Byrne was going to be a key player in the new series, In Treatment. 

WOW! I'm so glad I stuck it out...Gabriel Byrne...I first admired him years ago when he played in a robust movie called "Into The West" which I now own on DVD. He is one damn fine actor in a tour de force of a show that he can easily sink his teeth into. 

Diane Wiest as the therapist's therapist is noteworthy as well!

The plot is addictive...I quickly became committed to the weekly patients, some of whom I really hate. The script is detailed, intense and very well written. The simple sets and the subtle camera action during emotional moments, serves well to keep one purely focused on the drama. And man what drama! Even though it has no comedy, In Treatment is almost destined to be another big hit for HBO.

Some one suggested Robin Williams should have had the part of the psychoanalyst...what? I hope that was a joke.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16620,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-01-28","keywords":"therapist,based on israeli tv series,home office,treatment,therapist client relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000321/","name":"Gabriel Byrne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2499064/","name":"Uzo Aduba","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001848/","name":"Dianne Wiest"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073996/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0198598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092329/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006554/","name":"Rodrigo García","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505448/","name":"Hagai Levi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074844/","name":"Nir Bergman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi987152409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI1Y2FkNzktMjNkNC00NzNlLTg3MjktYjUzZDNlYTkzZGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI1Y2FkNzktMjNkNC00NzNlLTg3MjktYjUzZDNlYTkzZGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The HBO original series is back in session. The new season of In Treatment stars Emmy winner Uzo Aduba (Mrs. America, Orange Is The New Black) as the observant, empathetic Dr. Brooke Taylor, the therapist at the center of the season."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 1578887, Title: Luck, --- Description: Luck: Created by David Milch. With Dustin Hoffman, Dennis Farina, John Ortiz, Richard Kind. A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1578887/","name":"Luck","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5MDUyMDY0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTAyMTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1578887/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"AMichaelL","dateCreated":"2012-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Most Ironic Series Title, Ever.","reviewBody":"Luck was an epic show. In only 9 episodes, it weaved together numerous, insanely complex story lines which many people probably had trouble following. But what started as a 'too dense for anything but pretense' project soon turned into an amazingly broad show whose characters included mafia, rounders, trainers, jockeys, agents, horse owners, and many others - to create an incredibly smart show which, in my opinion, sought to expose the world of horse racing to the many who are uninformed, or simply would not normally care. The characters and writing were top notch, and this definitely should have been allowed more time to flesh out.\n\nHopefully another network won't be as scared of PETA and will pick it up.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5656,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2012-01-29","keywords":"horse race,horse trainer,organized crime,gambling,racetrack","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000163/","name":"Dustin Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001199/","name":"Dennis Farina","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651159/","name":"John Ortiz"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035930/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586965/","name":"David Milch"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Luck","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3881213465","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A promo for the new HBO series centered around characters tied to the same horse-racing track. "</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0421030, Title: Big Love, --- Description: Big Love: Created by Mark V. Olsen, Will Scheffer. With Bill Paxton, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Chloë Sevigny, Ginnifer Goodwin. A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. Olsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770504/","name":"Will Scheffer"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Big Love","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2768149273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A critic's trailer for the HBO drama "Big Love," now airing its final season."</script><metacontent="

A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. Between the NYC mayor, an unrelenting NYPD officer and clients old and new, Ray struggles to find a balance between fixing for clients and fixing himself. Premieres November 17 at 8/7c. Starring Liev Schreiber and Jon Voight."</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. programme.desc: The Hunt: Directed by Craig Zobel. With Betty Gilpin, Hilary Swank, Ike Barinholtz, Wayne Duvall. Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know where they are, or how they got there. They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8244784/","name":"The Hunt","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4MjRhZjgtNTIxOS00MmRjLTg4NTEtNjBkNzkwZjAxMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8244784/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MacQueen73"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not my usual thing - but great!","reviewBody":"Normally I can't be bothered with films like this, but I caught a few minutes of it by accident, downloaded it and watched straight through - and I loved it! Betty Gilpin is truly brilliant: totally believable as a stone-cold killer. The expressions she pulls, e.g. in the bunker when narrowly missed by an arrow, are hilarious. Totally agree with some other reviewers as well: this film is not meant to be taken too seriously. Haven't quite worked out what it's satirising, but I'm pretty hungover today so trying not to think too hard...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":88396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-03-13","keywords":"hunting humans,gun,satire,human hunted down for sport,reference to animal farm the novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi189054745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjUzODFkYmUtMjNkYi00MzEzLTgwMzUtNGY3NTg3M2E1ZmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjUzODFkYmUtMjNkYi00MzEzLTgwMzUtNGY3NTg3M2E1ZmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"The most talked about movie of the year is the one nobody has seen … yet.\r\n \r\nTwelve strangers wake up in a clearing.
